property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card or if undefeated, display it next to your deck. While displayed, for your move step, move to a random open location. You may not evade banes during this turn. At the end of your turn, you may succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 6 check to banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card or if undefeated, draw the scourge Curse of Daybane from the box, then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: During this encounter, items may not be played. If defeated, you may explore your location. If undefeated, you are dealt 1d4 Ranged combat damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card or if undefeated, display it next to your deck. While displayed, your Intelligence and Wisdom dice are each d4. During your exploration, if you encounter a monster, evade it. At the start of her turn, any character at your location may encounter this card. If defeated, banish it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat is increased by the scenario's adventure deck number. If defeated, you may explore again. If undefeated, each character at this location is dealt 1d4 Combat damage, then 1d4 Poison damage, then end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Stealth or Survival 9 check; otherwise, the Shrieky Plant is undefeated. If undefeated, examine the next 3 cards of your location deck and encounter the first monster examined. Then banish the Shrieky Plant.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, you may explore again. If undefeated, you are dealt 1d4 Combat damage. Then examine the top card of your location deck. If it is a bane, encounter it. If it is a boon, banish it and examine the top card of your location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, encounter it. Display this card next to the scenario; it is defeated. While displayed, after you roll a combat check against a monster, roll your Wisdom or Knowledge skill. If your combat check to defeat the monster exceeds the difficulty of the check plus the result, draw the scourge Curse of the Ravenous, then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, encounter it. Display this card next to the scenario; it is defeated. While displayed, when a barrier is defeated, if your check to defeat exceeds the difficulty by 1d6 or more, each character at that location banishes a card or summons and encounters the henchman Voices of the Spire, then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, encounter it. Display this card next to the scenario; it is defeated. While displayed, when a location is permanently closed, roll 1d6. If the result is higher than the number of cards remaining in that location deck, each character buries a card or a character at that location banishes a card, then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Wisdom check of 8 plus the scenario's adventure deck number; otherwise, you are dealt 1d4 Mental damage that may not be reduced. The difficulty to defeat is increased by twice the scenario's adventure deck number. If undefeated, each character at this location is dealt 1d4 Cold damage and is moved to a random other location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Beheaded is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before you act, roll 1d4. Each character at your location is dealt 1 damage of this type: 1. Fire 2. Acid 3. Cold 4. Electricity If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The difficulty to defeat is increased by twice the scenario's adventure deck number. If undefeated, draw the scourge Curse of Vulnerability from the box. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception or Charisma or Diplomacy 8 check to decrease the difficulty by 4. If defeated by less than 5, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from, then you may gain all the boons in this location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, each character at this location may draw a random non-Basic Item from the box. If defeated by less than 5, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from, then you may gain all the boons in this location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: While you act, when a character plays an ally that has the Animal trait, that character may put it on top of her deck. If defeated by less than 5, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from, then you may gain all the boons in this location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Graven Guardian of Nethys is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. The difficulty to defeat the Graven Guardian of Nethys is increased by the current scenario's adventure deck number. You may discard a card that has the Nethys trait to defeat the Graven Guardian of Nethys. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at this location is dealt 1 Poison damage. If defeated by less than 5, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from, then you may gain all the boons in this location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom, Perception, or Survival 6 check or the Sand Thief is undefeated. If undefeated, when the Sand Thief would deal damage to you, instead shuffle an item from your hand into your location deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character may reveal a blessing that has the Nethys trait; for each blessing revealed, add a die to your check to defeat. If defeated by no more than 4, you may gain all the boons in this location deck. NO HENCHMAN CLOSE

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Senenmerek is immune to the Mental, Poison and Cold traits. If your check to defeat has the Piercing or Slashing traits, the difficulty of the check is increased by 4. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from, then display Senenmerek next to the scenario. Banish this card to add 2d12 to a Wisdom check or a check to defeat a barrier.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Warrior Doll is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. The difficulty to defeat is increased by twice the current scenario's adventure deck number. If the check to defeat has the Fire trait, add 1 die to your check. If you do not defeat the Warrior Dolls by at least 2, shuffle a random barrier from the box into a random open location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may banish a card that has the Animal or Mount trait; if you do not, you are dealt 1d4 Acid damage. Then encounter this card. All damage dealt by the Acid Mantis is Acid damage. If your check to defeat has the Acid or Poison traits, add 3.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Caryatid Column is immune to the Attack, Mental, and Poison traits. If your check to defeat does not have the Bludgeoning trait, the difficulty is increased by 2.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Coffer Corpse is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, move to a random location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may discard a card that has the Bludgeoning trait and banish this card; otherwise, encounter it. If the check to defeat has the Acid trait, add 3.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Ghoul is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, end your turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Guardian Scroll is immune to Bludgeoning, Mental, and Poison. If your check to defeat the Guardian Scroll has the Fire trait, add 1 die.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Plague Zombie is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, banish the Plague Zombie, and each character at this location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or be dealt 1d4 Acid damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Shasalqu is immune to the Cold and Fire traits. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Wisdom 6 check or recharge 1d4 cards. After you act, if the roll exceeds 15, each character at your location is dealt 1 Cold damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Sun Falcon is immune to the Fire trait. All damage dealt by the Sun Falcon is Fire damage. If the check to defeat the Sun Falcon has the Cold trait, add 1d8. If defeated, shuffle the Sun Falcon into the blessings deck. When this card is the top card of the blessings discard pile, banish it and draw a random blessing from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Stealth 6 check or each character at your location summons and encounters an Ubashki Swarm. The Ubashki Swarm is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If the Ubashki Swarm is not defeated by at least 2 on both checks, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 7 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Imanish is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. Subtract 1 from each die rolled if your check has the Acid or Electricity trait. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 8 check or summon and encounter the Henchman Blightwing.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Perception 9 check or be dealt 1d4 Electricity damage. If undefeated, each character at this location is dealt 1d6 Electricity damage and must recharge 1d4 cards in his hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 9 check or the difficulty to defeat is increased by 3.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Velriana Unborn is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 8 check or be dealt 1d4 Cold damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire Azaz Arafe and Zazu, banish a card that has the Magic trait from your hand or discard pile. Recharge this card to examine the top card of your location deck. Discard this card to add the Magic trait to a combat check at your location, or to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire Black Kiss, you are dealt 1d4 Poison damage. Recharge this card to add your Craft skill and the Poison trait to a combat check at your location. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire Idorii, you are dealt 1d4 Combat damage. Recharge this card to add 1d4 to a combat check at your location. Discard this card to explore your location. Add 2d4 to combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire Khelru, discard the top card of the blessings deck. Reveal this card and shuffle 1d4 random cards from your discard pile into your deck, then discard this card. Discard this card to examine the top card of your location. You may then explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire Mad Dog Marrn, you may banish an ally that has the Animal trait from your hand or discard pile; I fyou do not, you are dealt 1d4 Combat damage. Recharge this card to add 1d8 to the Survival check of a character at your location. Discard this card to explore your location. If the card has the Trigger trait, you may evade it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1 die to your check against a card that has the Animal trait. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may reveal a Blessing that has the Pharasma trait to acquire it. If you fail the check to acquire Sebti the Crocodile, shuffle 3 random monsters from the box into your location. Recharge this card to examine the top 2 cards of a location. Discard this card to explore your location. Add 1d6 to Diplomacy checks during this exploration.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Acid, Cold, Combat, or Poison damage dealt to you by 3, or 5 if the damage is dealt by a bane that has the Undead trait. If proficient with light armors, bury this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0. You may succeed at a Craft 9 check to recharge this armor instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1 die to your Disable check or reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2. You may play another armor on this check. Discard this card to reduce Acid, Combat, or Fire damage dealt to you by 4. You may play another armor on this check.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clothing Light Armor Offhand Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon that has the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Recharge this card to reduce all damage dealt to you by 3. If proficient with light armors, you may also play another armor on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon that has the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Reveal this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 2. If proficient with light armors, you may play another armor on this check. If proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die and the Cold trait to any check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to any Wisdom non-combat check or check that invokes the Cold trait. Discard this card to examine the top card of your location. If the card has the Undead trait, you may explore your location. After you play this card, if it matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card and discard a spell to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 1d6; this counts as playing a spell. If the bane has the Construct or Undead trait, add another 1d6. Bury this card to evade your encounter against a monster that has the Undead trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce all damage dealt to you by 2. If it is Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Fire damage, you may recharge a random card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to reduce Cold or Poison damage dealt to you to 0; then bury 1d4 random cards from your discard pile. Reveal this card to add 2 and the Poison trait to your combat check; if it is against a bane that has the Undead trait, ignore its immunities. Then succeed at a Craft or Disable 7 check or bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal this card to examine the top card of your deck. You may additionally discard this card to add the examined card to your hand; otherwise, return the examined card to the top or bottom of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card after your check to choose a number. Reroll all dice that show that number; take the new result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you by a monster that has the Undead trait to 0. Recharge this card to examine the top card of your location, if the card has the Undead trait, you may evade or encounter it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may reveal a blessing that has the Thoth trait to acquire this card. Recharge this card to add 1 die to your Wisdom non-combat check or check against a bane that invokes the Cold trait. Recharge this card to add the Cold trait to your check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card at the start of your turn to move any number of characters to your location. Banish this card to add 1d8 to Stealth checks by characters at your location this turn.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card and choose a character at your location to recharge 1 random card from his discard pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to ignore a non-villain bane's power that happens before you act. Bury this card to reduce Cold, Combat, Electricity, or Poison damage dealt to you to 0. If proficient with light armors, discard this card instead. If proficent with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d6 to your Perception check. For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+1; you may additionally recharge this card to add 1d6. If you fail a combat check with this weapon, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice; take the new result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After the roll, reveal this card to add or subtract 2 from your Charisma or Diplomacy check. Recharge this card to add 3 to your check to defeat a barrier or your Intelligence or Wisdom check to acquire an item.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to draw 1 random non-Basic blessing from the box and add it to your hand. After playing this card, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: During your turn, discard this card to examine the top card of your location deck. If the card is a bane that has the Undead trait, you may immediately encounter it; otherwise, return it to the top of the deck. After playing this card, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at a Divine 7 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to your deck. While displayed, when you play a weapon on a combat check, add 1 plus the scenario's adventure deck number and the Fire trait. At the end of the turn, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt a Divine 7 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your check to defeat a barrier that has the Lock or Obstacle trait, you may discard this card to use your Arcane skill + 1d10. After playing this card, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 9 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to examine cards in your location deck until you find a boon. Encounter that boon, then shuffle your location. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 8 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to your location. While displayed, add 1 die to checks by characters at this location to defeat banes that have the Construct or Undead trait. When this location is closed, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, discard it, or you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 10 check to recharge it instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When a character at your location defeats a monster, display this card next to your location. While displayed, add 1 die to your Intelligence and Wisdom checks. When the location is closed, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt a Divine 6 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to a character. While displayed, reduce all damage dealt to that character by 4. At the end of your turn, discard this card. At the end of the turn, if you do not have either Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt an Arcane or Divine 9 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d4+1. If proficient with weapons, you may additionally recharge this card to add another 2d4. When playing another weapon, you may discard this card to add 1d4 to your combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d4 and the Cold trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged Skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally discard this card to add 1d6. If proficient with weapons, discard this card to ignore a non-villain monster's power that occurs before you act. If proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 and the Electricity and Ranged trait to your combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+1. If proficient with weapons, you may additionally discard this card to add 2 and the Bludgeoning trait to your check for each die rolled. Recharge this card to ignore a non-villain bane's power that happens after you act.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally recharge this card to add another 1d6. If not proﬁcient with weapons, the difﬁculty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8. If proficient with weapons, you may add or subtract 3 from your result. If you would fail this check, and you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to ignore the result and evade the bane.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d10+1; you may additionally discard this card to add 1d8 and the Electricity trait. If not proﬁcient with weapons, the difﬁculty of this check is increased by 4. If you would fail the check, you may discard this card to reroll the dice; take the new result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 3 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you discard cards as damage, suffer the scourge Curse of the Ravenous.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Choose three types of boons, then recharge 1 boon of each type.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 0 Spell 2 Armor 1 Item 1 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may recharge up to 1d4+1 cards.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Graven Guardian of Nethys.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 2 Weapon 0 Spell 1 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 1 Blessing 2

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you are dealt damage, instead you are dealt 1 Poison damage.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 7 or an Intelligence or Craft 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, banish a card that has the Curse trait displayed next to any character's deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Recharge an ally, or you may not move this turn.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma 6 check, then succeed at a different one of those.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may draw an item from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may draw an item from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 0 Spell 0 Armor 2 Item 2 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: All damage dealt is Fire damage.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Strength, Charisma, or Diplomacy check with a difficulty of 6 plus the scenario's adventure deck number.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may draw an armor from your bury or discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 1 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 1 Armor 1 Item 0 Ally 3 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you fail to acquire an ally, shuffle that card back into this location.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and acquire a random ally from the box.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Attr1
property.value:
At the end of your turn, roll 1d4 and bury all cards in your discard pile of this type: 1. Blessings 2. Allies 3. Spells and weapons 4. Items
You may only have 1 copy of this card displayed.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Akhentepi's Legacy Ahead of the Competition The Pharasmin Lottery Tomb Raiders Gone Rogue Sanctum of the Erudite Eye

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: When you are dealt Poison damage, if that damage is not reduced by at least 1, suffer the scourge Curse of Poisoning.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Scorched Ruins Tarworks Thornscrub Hot Springs Glass Pavillion Warehouse Crypt Peasant Tombs

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail to acquire an ally, summon and encounter the henchman Beheaded.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Tablet of Languages Lost

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dye Market Hall of Blessed Rebirth Tarworks Catacombs Towering Obelisk Earthworks Sulfur Pits Precious Mine

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you build locations, shuffle an additional barrier that has the Trap trait into each deck.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Trapped Sarcophagus

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Sand Thief Warrior Dolls

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat. Loot: Akhentepi's Armor

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Crypt Hall of Blessed Rebirth Oasis Catacombs Ruined Temple Stonework Passages Embalming Parlor Volcanic Vents

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you would encounter a boon, roll 1d6. If you roll a 1, banish it instead. If you roll a 2 or 3, display it next to this card instead, and if you win the scenario, acquire it. If you roll a 4, 5, or 6, encounter the boon.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Velriana Unborn

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Graven Guardian of Nethys Senenmerek Forgotten Pharaoh Cultists

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Spear of the Watchful Guardian

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dye Market Golden Lake Tooth and Hookah Precinct of Left Eyes Warehouse Quarry Dilapidated Plaza

property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may only win this scenario by closing all locations. If you defeat a bane by at least 7, discard the top card of the blessings deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Voices of the Spires

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Mausoleum Precinct of Left Eyes Tooth and Hookah Smoking Den Caravanserai Surgery Oasis Glass Pavillion

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When the henchman The Scorched Hand is banished, shuffle the villain Velriana Hypaxes and a number of monsters equal to 1 fewer than the number of open locations into a stack; then shuffle a card into each open location. To win this scenario, you must defeat Velriana Hypaxes.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Scorched Hand Cryptfinder Daughter of the Desert Dog Soldier Sand Scorpion Voices of the Spires

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Trader: Ghoul Market

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Offers armors. Cost: 2 boons.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you draw cards from the box to display on Sunburst Market, instead of the usual method, each character that is visiting Sunburst Market chooses a non-loot boon that has the Basic trait. Cost: 1 boon.
